name: towAR
description:
In a far-flung future, rival factions war over resources.

Take turns warping your troops onto hover-pads in the battlefield as you aim to connect 4 of your troops in a row before your enemies do in a Tic Tac Toe-esque game.

To set a match, find a busy or detailed surface to anchor your game to, and use your phone to place the board.

Augmented Reality Gaming
Solo or Multiplayer
Turn Based Strategy
